{"id":760969551,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 weeks, 5 days","timestamp":1659218802,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/760969551/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Increasing Decreasing String","memory":"7.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string sortString(string s) {\n       int count [26]={0};\n        for(int i =0 ;i< s.size();i++){\n            char ch = s[i];\n            count[ch-'a']++;\n        }\n        \n        string res ;\n        while(res.size()!=s.size()){\n            for(int i = 0 ;i<26;i++){\n                if(count[i] >0)  {\n                     char ch = i+'a';\n                      res += ch;\n                      count[i]--;\n                }    \n               \n                    }\n            for(int i = 25 ;i>=0 ;i--){\n                if(count[i] >0){\n                     char ch= i+'a';\n                     res += ch;\n                     count[i]--;\n                    }\n              }\n               \n         }\n    \n        return res ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"increasing-decreasing-string"}
